teams.name: Bengal Warriors
teams.details: The Bengal Warriors are a professional Kabaddi team based in Kolkata, West Bengal.

teams.name: Bengaluru Bulls
teams.details: Bengaluru Bulls is a franchise based in Bengaluru, Karnataka, and one of the strongest teams in the Pro Kabaddi League.

teams.name: Dabang Delhi KC
teams.details: Dabang Delhi KC is a Delhi-based Kabaddi team that has made a strong impact in the league.

teams.name: Gujarat Giants
teams.details: Gujarat Giants are known for their strong defense and teamwork in the Pro Kabaddi League.

teams.name: Haryana Steelers
teams.details: Haryana Steelers represent the state of Haryana and are known for their aggressive raiders.

teams.name: Jaipur Pink Panthers
teams.details: Owned by Bollywood star Abhishek Bachchan, the Jaipur Pink Panthers are one of the original teams of the league.

teams.name: Patna Pirates
teams.details: Patna Pirates are the most successful team in Pro Kabaddi League history with multiple championships.

teams.name: Puneri Paltan
teams.details: Puneri Paltan is a Pune-based team known for their resilience and competitive spirit.

teams.name: Tamil Thalaivas
teams.details: Tamil Thalaivas represent Tamil Nadu and are famous for their never-give-up attitude.

teams.name: U Mumba
teams.details: U Mumba is a Mumbai-based franchise and one of the most popular teams in the Pro Kabaddi League.
